verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> [Tmas-KilMaschil לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- for the sons קֹֽרַח׃ <WH7141> Ko-rach. of Korah כְּאַיָּ֗ל <WH354> ke-'ai-Yal, As the hart תַּעֲרֹ֥ג <WH6165> ta-'a-Rog panteth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and אֲפִֽיקֵי־ <WH650> 'a-fi-kei- brooks מָ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; after the water כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> ken So נַפְשִׁ֨י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul תַעֲרֹ֖ג <WH6165> ta-'a-Rog so panteth אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. after thee O God

צָמְאָ֬ה <WH6770> tza-me-'Ah thirsteth נַפְשִׁ֨י׀ <WH5315> naf-Shi My soul לֵאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> le-lo-Him for God לְאֵ֪ל <WH410> le-'El God חָ֥י <WH2416> chai for the living מָתַ֥י <WH4970> ma-Tai When אָב֑וֹא <WH935> a-Vo; when shall I come וְ֝אֵרָאֶ֗ה <WH7200> ve-'e-ra-'Eh, and appear פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. God

הָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> ha-ye-tah- have been לִּ֬י li דִמְעָתִ֣י <WH1832> dim-'a-Ti My tears לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem have been my meat יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> yo-Mam day וָלָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> va-La-ye-lah; and night בֶּאֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> be-'e-Mor say אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, while they continually אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. angels

אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These אֶזְכְּרָ֨ה׀ <WH2142> 'ez-ke-Rah When I remember וְאֶשְׁפְּכָ֬ה <WH8210> ve-'esh-pe-Chah these [things] I pour out עָלַ֨י׀ <WH5921> 'a-Lai within נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> naf-Shi, my soul כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אֶֽעֱבֹ֨ר׀ <WH5674> 'e-'e-Vor in me for I had gone בַּסָּךְ֮ <WH5519> bas-soCh with the multitude אֶדַּדֵּ֗ם <WH1718> 'ed-dad-Dem, I went עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit with them to the house אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God בְּקוֹל־ <WH6963> be-kol- with the voice רִנָּ֥ה <WH7440> rin-Nah of joy וְתוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> ve-to-Dah, and praise הָמ֥וֹן <WH1995> ha-Mon with a multitude חוֹגֵֽג׃ <WH2287> cho-Geg. that kept holyday

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ <WH7817> tish-To-cha-Chi Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> naf-Shi any וַתֶּהֱמִ֪י <WH1993> vat-te-he-Mi disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <WH5921> 'a-Lai within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <WH3176> ho-Chi-li in me;hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Le-lo-him thou in God כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ע֥וֹד <WH5750> od shall again אוֹדֶ֗נּוּ <WH3034> o-Den-nu, for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <WH3444> ye-shu-'ot him [for] the help פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> pa-Nav. of his countenance

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> 'elo-Hai, O my God עָלַי֮ <WH5921> 'a-Lai within נַפְשִׁ֪י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul תִשְׁתּ֫וֹחָ֥ח <WH7817> tish-To-Chach is cast down עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- within כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> Ken, after that אֶ֭זְכָּרְךָ <WH2142> 'Ez-ka-re-cha within me therefore will I remember מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz thee from the land יַרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> yar-Den; of Jordan וְ֝חֶרְמוֹנִ֗ים <WH2769> ve-cher-mo-Nim, and of the Hermonites מֵהַ֥ר <WH2022> me-Har from the hill מִצְעָֽר׃ <WH4706> mitz-'Ar. Mizar תְּהֽוֹם־ <WH8415> te-hom- confusion אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about

תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> te-Hom Deep ק֭וֹרֵא <WH7121> Ko-re calleth לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> le-Kol at the noise צִנּוֹרֶ֑יךָ <WH6794> tzin-no-Rei-cha; of thy waterspouts כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <WH4867> mish-ba-Rei-cha all thy waves וְ֝גַלֶּ֗יךָ <WH1530> ve-gal-Lei-cha, and thy billows עָלַ֥י <WH5921> 'a-Lai over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <WH5674> 'a-Va-ru. are gone

יוֹמָ֤ם׀ <WH3119> yo-Mam in the daytime יְצַוֶּ֬ה <WH6680> ye-tzav-Veh will command יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh [Yet] the LORD חַסְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> chas-Do, his lovingkindness וּ֭בַלַּיְלָה <WH3915> U-val-lay-lah and in the night; שִׁירָהּ shi-rah כשִׁירֹ֣ו <WH7892> shi-Ro musical קעִמִּ֑י <WH5973> 'im-Mi; with תְּ֝פִלָּ֗ה <WH8605> te-fil-Lah, [shall be] with me [and] my prayer לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> le-'El unto the God חַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> chai-Yai. of my life

אוֹמְרָ֤ה׀ <WH559> 'om-Rah I will say לְאֵ֥ל <WH410> le-'El unto God סַלְעִי֮ <WH5553> sal-'I my rock לָמָ֪ה <WH4100> la-Mah Why שְׁכַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <WH7911> she-Chach-Ta-ni Why hast thou forgotten לָֽמָּה־ <WH4100> lam-mah- Why קֹדֵ֥ר <WH6937> ko-Der I mourning אֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech, go בְּלַ֣חַץ <WH3906> be-La-chatz because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> o-Yev. of the enemy

בְּרֶ֤צַח׀ <WH7524> be-Re-tzach [As] with a sword בְּֽעַצְמוֹתַ֗י <WH6106> be-'atz-mo-Tai, in my bones חֵרְפ֥וּנִי <WH2778> che-re-Fu-ni reproach צוֹרְרָ֑י <WH6887> tzor-Rai; mine enemies בְּאָמְרָ֥ם <WH559> be-'a-me-Ram me while they say אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, daily אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. angels

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ <WH7817> tish-To-cha-Chi Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> naf-Shi any וּֽמַה־ <WH4100> u-mah- Why תֶּהֱמִ֪י <WH1993> te-he-Mi become עָ֫לָ֥י <WH5921> 'a-Lai within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <WH3176> ho-Chi-li within me;hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Le-lo-him thou in God כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ע֣וֹד <WH5750> od shall yet אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ <WH3034> o-Den-nu; for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת <WH3444> ye-shu-'Ot him [who is] the health פָּ֝נַ֗י <WH6440> pa-Nai, of my countenance וֵֽאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> Ve-lo-Hai. and my God
